Script to test plotting in 2D. First, load in libraries:
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
```
Now we load in the data


```{r}
data <- read_csv("~/GitHub/CalCOFI22/data/bottle_and_cast.csv")
lat <- data %>% pull(Lat_Dec)
lon <- data %>% pull(Lon_Dec)
```
and leaflet tiles:

```{r}
m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lng=mean(lon), lat=mean(lat))
print(m)
```
